item.title: Fascism Litmus Test
Eggs and Gender
item.description: Gender is weird. It’s such a social construct yet our society has been built on it on such a fundamental level that to most it’s a huge deal for most people to even consider changing from the gender they’ve been assigned. It’s an even bigger deal because of all the genocidal language that’s getting thrown around by neofascists about trans people as of late. Which, of course, means it’s a great time to resume the questioning I’ve been doing on and off for the last 5 years!
